title: RSPCB Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 100 Junior Environmental Engineer Posts
description: The Rajasthan State Pollution Control Board (RSPCB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 100 Junior Scientific Officer, Junior Environmental Engineer Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B.Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Civil Engineering, B.Sc, and M.Sc can apply for the RSPCB Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online ...
